item.description:
Since so many of us can't make it to a Friday showing (and I really really want to see this movie) I'm setting up a second meetup for Monday October 20th. Hopefully people can adjust their schedules and enjoy the show.




How about dinner and a movie?

Let's get dinner at The Olive Garden near the mall, and then walk over to the Regal theater to see THE SECRET LIFE OF BEES. it looks touching and funny but to find out more, watch the trailer at...

http://www.youtube.co...

More details to follow as showtimes are posted.
item.name: Secret Life of Bees Take Two! -Monday Oct 20th
